name: VietA
description:
VietA

32nd Century,

Conscientia Cooperation has started the mass production of androids by taking advantage of the experiments conducted by Aevi Gates. She lived in the 20th century and was definitely ahead of her time.

In the year 3167, it's now really hard to come across a human in the city; their presence has been taken over by androids. They are more significant and active in daily life now.

CREDITS

Scenario: Ahmet Bahadır Yücel, Deniz Gaziler, Eda Deniz

Art: Kuzey Can, Melike İrem Kadı, Özgür Eren Çelikkaya

Coding: Mustafa Can Akyazıcı, Yusuf Devranlı

Music: Gizem Aydın
